film_condensed: Ron has a threesome at a rodeo.
reality_condensed: Ron had a lot of sex, no bullriding.

film_condensed: He & the guys talk about Rock Hudson being gay.
TJ prepares to ride a bull, Ron encourages him.
The bull ditches TJ straight away.
Gamblers chase Ron, who punches officer Tucker to get arrested.
Tucker drops Ron at the trailer park.
Ron stumbles, Tucker is worried.
Ron's ears ring, he passes out.
He wakes up, weak & coughing.
He sells cocaine at work on the oil rig.
The boss calls him over to deal with an injury.
Ron flicks a switch, gets electrocuted.
He wakes up in hospital.
Dr. Saks (Eve) & Dr. Sevard tell Ron he's HIV+.
He's angry, in denial.
He hangs back from partying with TJ.
He tells TJ about the diagnosis.
TJ leaves with 2 women, Ron stays.
He looks scared.
He researches HIV/AIDS at the library.
A drugs rep pitches AZT to hospital staff.
Eve is concerned about AZT's safety.
Ron learns HIV is sexually & intravenously transmitted.
Flashback to Ron having unprotected sex with an addict.
reality_condensed: Ron contracted HIV from a user.

film_condensed: He hits the desk, screams.
At the hospital he demands to see Sevard.
Eve turns up, offers her help.
reality_condensed: Ron would deal with one doctor.

film_condensed: Ron clocks a janitor looking at him.
Ron begs Eve for AZT. She says no.
reality_condensed: Ron was denied AZT, sued for it.

film_condensed: At the bar, Ron's friends reject him.
The guys are disgusted that he touched them.
Ron enters a support meeting, walks straight out.
He prays for more time.
He approaches the janitor at a strip club.
Hospital carpark, janitor drops a package for Ron.
It's AZT. Ron swallows a few pills.
His colleagues refuse him entry at work.
Montage - Ron unravels...
janitor says no more AZT. Ron passes out.
reality_condensed: Ron passed out, woke up in hospital.

film_condensed: Ron wakes in hospital. Sevard questions the AZT in his system.
HIV patient Rayon, a trans woman, walks over.
Rayon & Ron play cards.
Ron's leg cramps, Rayon squeezes it.
Rayon compliments Ron's feet, he pulls away.
Rayon explains she's in the AZT trial, Ron wants in.
reality_condensed: People on AZT trials pooled their meds.

film_condensed: He walks out, on a mission.
reality_condensed: Ron wouldn't give in to AIDS.

film_condensed: He gets home to find his trailer vandalised.
He searches for his stashed cash.
He drives away with his cash & a painting.
He breaks down weeping.
He drives to a hospital the janitor spoke of, in Mexico.
reality_condensed: Ron met a doctor in Mexico.

film_condensed: Ron asks Dr. Vass for AZT, he refuses.
reality_condensed: Ron met a doctor in Mexico.

film_condensed: Vass puts him on a regimen of healthy supplements.
Eve treats Rayon, they are friends.
Ron's looking good, suggests Vass sells his vitamin cocktail.
reality_condensed: Ron had dealings with Mexican doctors.

film_condensed: Ron makes plans to smuggle Vass' drugs.
reality_condensed: Ron packed his Lincoln with drugs.

film_condensed: Ron tries to cross the border dressed as a priest.
Barkley of FDA questions him at customs.
Ron tries to sell to gay guys, unsuccessful.
FDA end AZT trial early. Eve worried.
reality_condensed: AZT hit the market in record time.

film_condensed: Sevard dismisses Eve's concerns.
Rayon teases Ron, says she can get him clients.
They cut a deal.
Sales are great.
They sell in a gay club.
reality_condensed: Ron worked with the gay community.

film_condensed: Ron back in the library, researching.
He & Rayon pull into an apartment complex.
reality_condensed: Ron worked out of an office.

film_condensed: They enter a run-down apartment, their new 'office'.
reality_condensed: Ron worked out of an office.

film_condensed: They've set up a buyers club.
reality_condensed: Ron set up a buyers club.

film_condensed: AZT approved by the FDA.
reality_condensed: AZT was approved in record time.

film_condensed: Ron & Rayon look better, business is good.
reality_condensed: The club was succesful, Ron grew stronger.

film_condensed: Eve asks after Rayon in the hospital.
Ron orders InterfeRon from Japan.
Eve finds Rayon's files in Ron's office.
Ron & Rayon shop for healthfood.
They bump into TJ, he insults Rayon, Ron attacks him.
Men queue outside the office for membership.
A guy wants to join for $50. Ron says no, it's $400.
Ron prepares to go overseas. Rayon is high.
Ron pulls up in Tokyo.
Yamata won't sell him InterfeRon, only doctors can buy it.
reality_condensed: Ron bribed a worker to show him the accounts.

film_condensed: Ron bribes a doctor to order it.
reality_condensed: Ron bribed a doctor to order Interferon.

film_condensed: Ron dresses up for customs.
reality_condensed: Ron dressed up to get through customs.

film_condensed: He fakes it through as a doctor.
reality_condensed: Ron dressed up to get through customs.

film_condensed: Ron injects InterfeRon, has a heart attack.
In hospital, Ron wakes to questions from Sevard, Barkley.
Ron & Rayon leave.
Eve defends buyers clubs to Sevard.
FDA confiscate Ron's InterfeRon.
Montage - Ron travels the world to source InterfeRon.
Eve is concerned about the safety of Ron's club.
reality_condensed: Some doctors worked with buyers clubs.

film_condensed: Sevard's trial patients have abandoned him.
reality_condensed: Patients often switched from hospitals to clubs.

film_condensed: A woman joins the buyers club, the first.
Ron asks secretary Denise about the woman.
Everyone can hear Ron & woman having sex.
Ron & woman have desperate sex.
Ron walks to his office, he's doing well.
He finds Rayon off her face on drugs.
The IRS audit the club. Ron's not happy.
News hits of AIDS-drug protests.
Ron takes his meds, looks well.
reality_condensed: Ron felt positive about his self-medication.

film_condensed: Ron dresses up for a date, takes his painting along.
He meets Eve, gives her the painting.
Asks Eve to spy on Sevard.
They talk about their families.
At the office, Ron annoyed by Rayon's pictures of hot guys.
Eve contemplates the painting.
Barkley & police raid the club, confiscate the drugs.
Ron demands a restraining order against govt. & FDA.
New regulations make buyers clubs illegal.
Ron tries to get doctors to prescribe his meds.
reality_condensed: Ron had a string of suppliers.

film_condensed: Rayon tells Ron they're broke.
Tucker gives his father the meds Ron sent him.
Ron is offered a free property for his growing club.
Rayon snorts lines. She & Ron recruit members.
Rayon begs her father for money.
Ron can't get prescriptions since the new regs.
Rayon, distressed, looks into the mirror.
Ron tries another doctor, no luck.
Rayon puts a fat cash envelope on Ron's desk.
Ron questions her, then thanks her.
Ron asks Eve for prescriptions, she refuses.
Rayon is in a bad way. Boyfriend SUNNY takes her to hospital.
Ron visits Vass, arranges more smuggling.
reality_condensed: Ron met a doctor in Mexico.

film_condensed: Eve visits Rayon, who is unconscious.
Ron follows a light into a room of butterflies.
Rayon takes her last few breaths.
Ron on a plane, writing scripts on a pad he stole from Eve.
Ron questioned at US customs.
Denise tells Ron about Rayon. He goes to her.
Ron arrives too late, Rayon is dead.
Ron storms down the hallway.
He finds Sevard, accuses him of murder through AZT.
Ron drives home, dejected.
Ron breaks down in fRont of a prostitute.
Men are queuing outside the new office.
Ron tells Denise to sell his car to get two guys treatment.
Ron & Eve fight about Rayon's treatment. He gives her a Lancet study.
reality_condensed: The Lancet published concerns about AZT.

film_condensed: Eve goes home, gets mad, smashes up her wall.
Eve instructs nurse to lower patients' AZT to min. dosage.
Ron decides to take his case higher after restraining order application failed.
Eve drops anti-AZT flyers around the hospital.
Ron interrupts Barkley speaking at a support group. They argue.
reality_condensed: Ron was a thorn in the FDA's side.

film_condensed: The hospital push Eve to resign. She insists they fire her.
Ron & Eve talk.
Eve adjusts the painting to hang straight.
Ron's drugs have run out, his health is failing.
reality_condensed: Ron felt worse off Peptide T.

film_condensed: He wanders, dazed, into a busy road. Police arrive.
Tucker guides Ron to safety.
Tucker gives Ron his father's meds.
Ron arrives at the US District Court. He's weak.
reality_condensed: Ron took the FDA to court.

film_condensed: Ron's case is dismissed, despite judge's sympathy.
Eve gets the news.
Ron flies home, hopeless.
Ron's people welcome him back with applause.
The FDA later allowed Ron his meds for personal use.
He rides a bull, crowds cheer.
He died 1992, 7yrs after diagnosis.
Low-dose AZT later saved millions of lives.
